title: [request] option for show/hide full name of connections on tabs
author: UJX6N
body_snippet:
## Expected Behavior
An option for show/hide full-name of connections on tabs. I need this because I got dozens conns with similar names except last couple characters are different (mostly IP addresses). 

## Current Behavior
It's difficult to identify conns with similar names by tab titles in ver 1.77.  Mouse over on tabs can do but not handy.

## Possible Solution
An option for show/hide full-name of connections on tabs. With this option ON the full name of conns will shown on tabs rath...
